fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: boiler_id
fields.description: Boiler identification code. Alphanumeric.

fields.name: fuel_type_code
fields.description: The fuel code reported to EIA. Two or three letter alphanumeric.

fields.name: fuel_type_code_pudl
fields.description: Standardized fuel codes in PUDL.

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: fuel_consumed_units
fields.description: Consumption of the fuel type in physical units. Note: this is the total quantity consumed for both electricity and, in the case of combined heat and power plants, process steam production.

fields.name: fuel_mmbtu_per_unit
fields.description: Heat content of the fuel in millions of Btus per physical unit.

fields.name: sulfur_content_pct
fields.description: Sulfur content percentage by weight to the nearest 0.01 percent.

fields.name: ash_content_pct
fields.description: Ash content percentage by weight to the nearest 0.1 percent.

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: generator_id
fields.description: EIA-assigned generator identification code.

fields.name: boiler_id
fields.description: EIA-assigned boiler identification code.

fields.name: unit_id_eia
fields.description: EIA-assigned unit identification code.

fields.name: unit_id_pudl
fields.description: PUDL-assigned unit identification number.

fields.name: bga_source
fields.description: The source from where the unit_id_pudl is compiled. The unit_id_pudl comes directly from EIA 860, or string association (which looks at all the boilers and generators that are not associated with a unit and tries to find a matching string in the respective collection of boilers or generator), or from a unit connection (where the unit_id_eia is employed to find additional boiler generator connections).

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: boiler_id
fields.description: The EIA-assigned boiler identification code. Alphanumeric.

fields.name: prime_mover_code
fields.description: Code for the type of prime mover (e.g. CT, CG)

fields.name: fuel_unit
fields.description: The type of physical units fuel consumption is reported in. All consumption is reported in either short tons for solids, thousands of cubic feet for gases, or barrels for liquids.

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: generator_id
fields.description: Generator identification code. Alphanumeric

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: net_generation_mwh
fields.description: Net generation for specified period in megawatthours (MWh).

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: generator_id
fields.description: Generator identification number.

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: operational_status_code
fields.description: The operating status of the generator.

fields.name: operational_status
fields.description: The operating status of the generator. This is based on which tab the generator was listed in in EIA 860.

fields.name: ownership_code
fields.description: Identifies the ownership for each generator.

fields.name: capacity_mw
fields.description: The highest value on the generator nameplate in megawatts rounded to the nearest tenth.

fields.name: summer_capacity_mw
fields.description: The net summer capacity.

fields.name: winter_capacity_mw
fields.description: The net winter capacity.

fields.name: energy_source_code_1
fields.description: The code representing the most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator.

fields.name: energy_source_code_2
fields.description: The code representing the second most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator

fields.name: energy_source_code_3
fields.description: The code representing the third most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator

fields.name: energy_source_code_4
fields.description: The code representing the fourth most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator

fields.name: energy_source_code_5
fields.description: The code representing the fifth most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator

fields.name: energy_source_code_6
fields.description: The code representing the sixth most predominant type of energy that fuels the generator

fields.name: fuel_type_code_pudl
fields.description: Standardized fuel codes in PUDL.

fields.name: multiple_fuels
fields.description: Can the generator burn multiple fuels?

fields.name: deliver_power_transgrid
fields.description: Indicate whether the generator can deliver power to the transmission grid.

fields.name: syncronized_transmission_grid
fields.description: Indicates whether standby generators (SB status) can be synchronized to the grid.

fields.name: turbines_num
fields.description: Number of wind turbines, or hydrokinetic buoys.

fields.name: planned_modifications
fields.description: Indicates whether there are any planned capacity uprates/derates, repowering, other modifications, or generator retirements scheduled for the next 5 years.

fields.name: planned_net_summer_capacity_uprate_mw
fields.description: Increase in summer capacity expected to be realized from the modification to the equipment.

fields.name: planned_net_winter_capacity_uprate_mw
fields.description: Increase in winter capacity expected to be realized from the uprate modification to the equipment.

fields.name: planned_uprate_date
fields.description: Planned effective date that the generator is scheduled to enter operation after the uprate modification.

fields.name: planned_net_summer_capacity_derate_mw
fields.description: Decrease in summer capacity expected to be realized from the derate modification to the equipment.

fields.name: planned_net_winter_capacity_derate_mw
fields.description: Decrease in winter capacity expected to be realized from the derate modification to the equipment.

fields.name: planned_derate_date
fields.description: Planned effective month that the generator is scheduled to enter operation after the derate modification.

fields.name: planned_new_prime_mover_code
fields.description: New prime mover for the planned repowered generator.

fields.name: planned_energy_source_code_1
fields.description: New energy source code for the planned repowered generator.

fields.name: planned_repower_date
fields.description: Planned effective date that the generator is scheduled to enter operation after the repowering is complete.

fields.name: other_planned_modifications
fields.description: Indicates whether there are there other modifications planned for the generator.

fields.name: other_modifications_date
fields.description: Planned effective date that the generator is scheduled to enter commercial operation after any other planned modification is complete.

fields.name: planned_retirement_date
fields.description: Planned effective date of the scheduled retirement of the generator.

fields.name: carbon_capture
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses carbon capture technology.

fields.name: startup_source_code_1
fields.description: The code representing the first, second, third or fourth start-up and flame stabilization energy source used by the combustion unit(s) associated with this generator.

fields.name: startup_source_code_2
fields.description: The code representing the first, second, third or fourth start-up and flame stabilization energy source used by the combustion unit(s) associated with this generator.

fields.name: startup_source_code_3
fields.description: The code representing the first, second, third or fourth start-up and flame stabilization energy source used by the combustion unit(s) associated with this generator.

fields.name: startup_source_code_4
fields.description: The code representing the first, second, third or fourth start-up and flame stabilization energy source used by the combustion unit(s) associated with this generator.

fields.name: technology_description
fields.description: High level description of the technology used by the generator to produce electricity.

fields.name: turbines_inverters_hydrokinetics
fields.description: Number of wind turbines, or hydrokinetic buoys.

fields.name: time_cold_shutdown_full_load_code
fields.description: The minimum amount of time required to bring the unit to full load from shutdown.

fields.name: planned_new_capacity_mw
fields.description: The expected new namplate capacity for the generator.

fields.name: cofire_fuels
fields.description: Can the generator co-fire fuels?.

fields.name: switch_oil_gas
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator switch between oil and natural gas.

fields.name: nameplate_power_factor
fields.description: The nameplate power factor of the generator.

fields.name: minimum_load_mw
fields.description: The minimum load at which the generator can operate at continuosuly.

fields.name: uprate_derate_during_year
fields.description: Was an uprate or derate completed on this generator during the reporting year?

fields.name: uprate_derate_completed_date
fields.description: The date when the uprate or derate was completed.

fields.name: current_planned_operating_date
fields.description: The most recently updated effective date on which the generator is scheduled to start operation

fields.name: summer_estimated_capability_mw
fields.description: EIA estimated summer capacity (in MWh).

fields.name: winter_estimated_capability_mw
fields.description: EIA estimated winter capacity (in MWh).

fields.name: operating_switch
fields.description: Indicates whether the proposed unit will be able to switch fuels while operating.

fields.name: retirement_date
fields.description: Date of the scheduled or effected retirement of the generator.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: generator_id
fields.description: Generator identification number

fields.name: prime_mover_code
fields.description: EIA assigned code for the prime mover (i.e. the engine, turbine, water wheel, or similar machine that drives an electric generator)

fields.name: duct_burners
fields.description: Indicates whether the unit has duct-burners for supplementary firing of the turbine exhaust gas

fields.name: operating_date
fields.description: Date the generator began commercial operation

fields.name: topping_bottoming_code
fields.description: If the generator is associated with a combined heat and power system, indicates whether the generator is part of a topping cycle or a bottoming cycle

fields.name: solid_fuel_gasification
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator is part of a solid fuel gasification system

fields.name: pulverized_coal_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses pulverized coal technology

fields.name: fluidized_bed_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses fluidized bed technology

fields.name: subcritical_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses subcritical technology

fields.name: supercritical_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses supercritical technology

fields.name: ultrasupercritical_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses ultra-supercritical technology

fields.name: stoker_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses stoker technology

fields.name: other_combustion_tech
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator uses other combustion technologies

fields.name: heat_bypass_recovery
fields.description: Can this generator operate while bypassing the heat recovery steam generator?

fields.name: rto_iso_lmp_node_id
fields.description: The designation used to identify the price node in RTO/ISO Locational Marginal Price reports

fields.name: rto_iso_location_wholesale_reporting_id
fields.description: The designation used to report ths specific location of the wholesale sales transactions to FERC for the Electric Quarterly Report

fields.name: associated_combined_heat_power
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator is associated with a combined heat and power system

fields.name: original_planned_operating_date
fields.description: The date the generator was originally scheduled to be operational

fields.name: operating_switch
fields.description: Indicates whether the fuel switching generator can switch when operating

fields.name: previously_canceled
fields.description: Indicates whether the generator was previously reported as indefinitely postponed or canceled

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL-issued surrogate key.

fields.name: state
fields.description: State the plant is located in.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: unitid
fields.description: Facility-specific unit id (e.g. Unit 4)

fields.name: operating_datetime_utc
fields.description: Date and time measurement began.

fields.name: operating_time_hours
fields.description: Length of time interval measured.

fields.name: gross_load_mw
fields.description: Power delivered during time interval measured.

fields.name: steam_load_1000_lbs
fields.description: Total steam pressure produced by a unit or source in any calendar year (or other specified time period) produced by combusting a given heat input of fuel.

fields.name: so2_mass_lbs
fields.description: Sulfur dioxide emissions in pounds.

fields.name: so2_mass_measurement_code
fields.description: Identifies whether the reported value of emissions was measured, calculated, or measured and substitute.

fields.name: nox_rate_lbs_mmbtu
fields.description: The average rate at which NOx was emitted during a given time period.

fields.name: nox_rate_measurement_code
fields.description: Identifies whether the reported value of emissions was measured, calculated, or measured and substitute.

fields.name: nox_mass_lbs
fields.description: Nitrogen oxide emissions in pounds.

fields.name: nox_mass_measurement_code
fields.description: Identifies whether the reported value of emissions was measured, calculated, or measured and substitute.

fields.name: co2_mass_tons
fields.description: Carbon dioxide emissions in short tons.

fields.name: co2_mass_measurement_code
fields.description: Identifies whether the reported value of emissions was measured, calculated, or measured and substitute.

fields.name: heat_content_mmbtu
fields.description: The measure of utilization that is calculated by multiplying the quantity of fuel by the fuel's heat content.

fields.name: facility_id
fields.description: The unique six-digit facility identification number, also called an ORISPL, assigned by the Energy Information Administration.

fields.name: unit_id_epa
fields.description: Unique EPA identifier for each unit at a facility.

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: utility_id_eia
fields.description: EIA-assigned identification number for the company that is responsible for the day-to-day operations of the generator.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: generator_id
fields.description: Generator identification number.

fields.name: operational_status_code
fields.description: The operating status of the generator.

fields.name: owner_utility_id_eia
fields.description: EIA-assigned owner's identification number.

fields.name: owner_name
fields.description: Name of owner.

fields.name: owner_state
fields.description: Two letter US state and territory abbreviations.

fields.name: owner_city
fields.description: City of owner.

fields.name: owner_street_address
fields.description: Steet address of owner.

fields.name: owner_zip_code
fields.description: Zip code of owner.

fields.name: fraction_owned
fields.description: Percent of generator ownership.

fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL issued surrogate key.

fields.name: plant_id_eia
fields.description: EIA Plant Identification number. One to five digit numeric.

fields.name: report_date
fields.description: Date reported.

fields.name: ash_impoundment
fields.description: Is there an ash impoundment (e.g. pond, reservoir) at the plant?

fields.name: ash_impoundment_lined
fields.description: If there is an ash impoundment at the plant, is the impoundment lined?

fields.name: ash_impoundment_status
fields.description: If there is an ash impoundment at the plant, the ash impoundment status as of December 31 of the reporting year.

fields.name: energy_storage
fields.description: Indicates if the facility has energy storage capabilities.

fields.name: ferc_cogen_docket_no
fields.description: The docket number relating to the FERC qualifying facility cogenerator status.

fields.name: ferc_exempt_wholesale_generator_docket_no
fields.description: The docket number relating to the FERC qualifying facility exempt wholesale generator status.

fields.name: ferc_small_power_producer_docket_no
fields.description: The docket number relating to the FERC qualifying facility small power producer status.

fields.name: liquefied_natural_gas_storage
fields.description: Indicates if the facility have the capability to store the natural gas in the form of liquefied natural gas.

fields.name: natural_gas_local_distribution_company
fields.description: Names of Local Distribution Company (LDC), connected to natural gas burning power plants.

fields.name: natural_gas_storage
fields.description: Indicates if the facility have on-site storage of natural gas.

fields.name: natural_gas_pipeline_name_1
fields.description: The name of the owner or operator of natural gas pipeline that connects directly to this facility or that connects to a lateral pipeline owned by this facility.

fields.name: natural_gas_pipeline_name_2
fields.description: The name of the owner or operator of natural gas pipeline that connects directly to this facility or that connects to a lateral pipeline owned by this facility.

fields.name: natural_gas_pipeline_name_3
fields.description: The name of the owner or operator of natural gas pipeline that connects directly to this facility or that connects to a lateral pipeline owned by this facility.

fields.name: net_metering
fields.description: Did this plant have a net metering agreement in effect during the reporting year?  (Only displayed for facilities that report the sun or wind as an energy source).

fields.name: pipeline_notes
fields.description: Additional owner or operator of natural gas pipeline.

fields.name: regulatory_status_code
fields.description: Indicates whether the plant is regulated or non-regulated.

fields.name: transmission_distribution_owner_id
fields.description: EIA-assigned code for owner of transmission/distribution system to which the plant is interconnected.

fields.name: transmission_distribution_owner_name
fields.description: Name of the owner of the transmission or distribution system to which the plant is interconnected.

fields.name: transmission_distribution_owner_state
fields.description: State location for owner of transmission/distribution system to which the plant is interconnected.

fields.name: utility_id_eia
fields.description: EIA-assigned identification number for the company that is responsible for the day-to-day operations of the generator.

fields.name: water_source
fields.description: Name of water source associater with the plant.

fields.description: Plant's grid voltage at point of interconnection to transmission or distibution facilities

fields.name: nerc_region
fields.description: NERC region in which the plant is located

fields.name: primary_purpose_naics_id
fields.description: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code that best describes the primary purpose of the reporting plant

fields.description: Zip code of the operator/owner

fields.description: Is the reporting entity an owner of power plants reported on Schedule 2 of the form?

fields.description: Entity type of principle owner (C = Cooperative, I = Investor-Owned Utility, Q = Independent Power Producer, M = Municipally-Owned Utility, P = Political Subdivision, F = Federally-Owned Utility, S = State-Owned Utility, IND = Industrial, COM = Commercial
